file.name: deviceConnection.yaml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2

info:
  title: Eclipse Kapua REST API - Device Connection
  version: '1.0'
  contact:
    name: Eclipse Kapua Dev Team
    url: https://eclipse.org/kapua
    email: kapua-dev@eclipse.org
  license:
    name: Eclipse Public License 2.0
    url: https://www.eclipse.org/legal/epl-2.0

paths: {}

components:
  parameters:
    connectionId:
      name: connectionId
      in: path
      description: The ID of the Connection on which to perform the operation
      schema:
        $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
      required: true
    connectionStatus:
      name: status
      in: query
      description: The connection status to filter results
      schema:
        $ref: './deviceConnection.yaml#/components/schemas/connectionStatus'
  schemas:
    connection:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaUpdatableEntity'
        - type: object
          properties:
            status:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/connectionStatus'
            clientId:
              type: string
            userId:
              allOf:
                - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
            allowUserChange:
              type: boolean
            userCouplingMode:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/userCouplingMode'
            reservedUserId:
              allOf:
                - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
            protocol:
              type: string
            clientIp:
              type: string
            serverIp:
              type: string
              readOnly: true
          example:
            type: deviceConnection
            id: Gd1BfeWwh3s
            scopeId: AQ
            createdOn: '2019-09-12T09:04:32.101Z'
            createdBy: Ag
            modifiedOn: '2019-09-13T08:04:49.927Z'
            modifiedBy: Ag
            optlock: 17
            status: CONNECTED
            clientId: Client-Id-1
            userId: Ag
            allowUserChange: false
            userCouplingMode: INHERITED
            protocol: MQTT
            clientIp: tcp://172.21.0.1:44400
            serverIp: broker
    connectionListResult:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaListResult'
        - type: object
          properties:
            items:
              type: array
              items:
                $ref: '#/components/schemas/connection'
          example:
            type: deviceConnectionListResult
            limitExceeded: false
            size: 1
            items:
              - type: deviceConnection
                id: Gd1BfeWwh3s
                scopeId: AQ
                createdOn: '2019-09-12T09:04:32.101Z'
                createdBy: Ag
                modifiedOn: '2019-09-13T08:04:49.927Z'
                modifiedBy: Ag
                optlock: 17
                status: CONNECTED
                clientId: Client-Id-1
                userId: Ag
                allowUserChange: false
                userCouplingMode: INHERITED
                protocol: MQTT
                clientIp: tcp://172.21.0.1:44400
                serverIp: broker
    connectionOptions:
      allOf:
        - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaUpdatableEntity'
        - type: object
          properties:
            allowUserChange:
              type: boolean
            userCouplingMode:
              $ref: '#/components/schemas/userCouplingMode'
            reservedUserId:
              allOf:
                - $ref: '../openapi.yaml#/components/schemas/kapuaId'
          example:
            type: deviceConnectionOption
            id: Gd1BfeWwh3s
            scopeId: AQ
            createdOn: '2019-09-12T09:04:32.101Z'
            createdBy: Ag
            modifiedOn: '2019-09-13T08:04:49.927Z'
            modifiedBy: Ag
            optlock: 17
            allowUserChange: false
            userCouplingMode: INHERITED
    userCouplingMode:
      type: string
      enum:
        - INHERITED
        - LOOSE
        - STRICT
    connectionStatus:
      type: string
      enum:
        - 'CONNECTED'
        - 'DISCONNECTED'
        - 'MISSING'
        - 'NULL'

Error: parse: parse spec: parse components: parameters: "connectionStatus": schema: parse schema: resolve "./deviceConnection.yaml#/components/schemas/connectionStatus": external "./deviceConnection.yaml": file: local file reference is not allowed
